question_patterns: why do you want to work
templates.answer_template: I'm drawn to {company}'s mission and innovative work in {field}. With my background in {skill}, I'm excited to contribute to {contribution}.
Based on my experience and the role's requirements, I'm targeting {range}. However, I'm flexible and open to discussing total compensation including benefits and equity.
I can start {timeframe}. I'm flexible on the exact date to accommodate any necessary transitions.
I have {years} years of professional experience in {field}, with deep expertise in {technologies}.
I've been working on improving my {area}. I've taken steps like {action} which has helped me make significant progress.
I'm most productive in a {preference} environment, but I'm adaptable and can work effectively in various settings based on team needs.
